Sentencas: La-Si metallic coatings with La/Si ratios between 1.55 and 1.66 were synthesized by Direct Current Magnetron Sputtering of lanthanum and silicon targets in pure argon atmosphere.
Titulo: Synthesis and Characterization of Apatite Structure Sputter Deposited Coatings Dedicated to Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: After the deposition stage, the ceramic apatite-structure coatings were obtained by thermal oxidation in air for 2 hours at 1173 K.
Titulo: Synthesis and Characterization of Apatite Structure Sputter Deposited Coatings Dedicated to Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The structural and chemical features of these films have been assessed by X-Ray Diffraction (XRD) and Scanning Electron Microscopy (SEM) equipped with Energy Dispersive Spectroscopy (EDS).
Titulo: Synthesis and Characterization of Apatite Structure Sputter Deposited Coatings Dedicated to Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The electrical properties were determined by Complex Impedance Spectroscopy in planar configuration.
Titulo: Synthesis and Characterization of Apatite Structure Sputter Deposited Coatings Dedicated to Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The films with near apatite structure La/Si atomic ratio in range of La(10)Si(6)0(27) and La(9.33)Si(6)0(26) deposited on different substrates were initially amorphous.
Titulo: Synthesis and Characterization of Apatite Structure Sputter Deposited Coatings Dedicated to Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: After thermal oxidation at 1173 K in air, the coating crystallised under the expected apatite structure.
Titulo: Synthesis and Characterization of Apatite Structure Sputter Deposited Coatings Dedicated to Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: SEM observation revealed that the film compactness and thickness increased after thermal oxidation.
Titulo: Synthesis and Characterization of Apatite Structure Sputter Deposited Coatings Dedicated to Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The film adhesion on SOFCs material is guaranteed if the anode support was not reduced before the deposition stage.
Titulo: Synthesis and Characterization of Apatite Structure Sputter Deposited Coatings Dedicated to Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: A specific method was performed to measure the electrical conductivity, i.e. to determine the ionic conductivity of the film: it uses the four-point probe technique combined with ac impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Synthesis and Characterization of Apatite Structure Sputter Deposited Coatings Dedicated to Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The good agreement between measurements performed in this work (Ea = 0.75 eV, 973 K, sigma = 3-4 10(-3) S.cm(-1)) and literature data allows concluding that deposited layers are of good quality and should be used as electrolyte in an Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (IT-SOFC).
Titulo: Synthesis and Characterization of Apatite Structure Sputter Deposited Coatings Dedicated to Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
